assemblies.name: Chainsword
description: 404 DESCRIPTION NOT FOUND

assemblies.name: PiercingBlade
description:
By incorporating advanced nano technology to strengthen and sharpen melee weapons, their durability will be increased substantially.
As a side effect, the weapon is extremely effective at bypassing armor on enemies.

assemblies.name: SpeedloaderPistol
description: Converts the weapon into a revolver-type weapon. Generally, a revolver will be slower, but far more powerful than normal pistols.

assemblies.name: SilencedPistol
description:
Converts the weapon into a stealthy weapon, that will not alert monsters beyond close range.
The effect of a blursphere will increase their damage exponentially while it is active.

assemblies.name: ShredderPistol
description: Shredder weapons fire off the pellets in a shell one after another, instead of all at once like a proper shotgun.

assemblies.name: ElephantGun
description:
The Elephant Gun takes all the pellets of the shotgun, and combines them into a fairly accurate single slug.
Powerful at ranges where the shotgun starts to drop off, and armor piercing.

assemblies.name: GatlingGun
description:
A chaingun type weapon with an increase to all stats.
Damage, mag, accuracy are all increased, but windup and down is as well.

assemblies.name: MicroLauncher
description: A smaller, less powerful rocket launcher that reloads much faster. Great for smaller enemies or when you have a surplus of rockets.

assemblies.name: HighPowerWeapon
description:
Increases the base damage of a weapon by 2, and the max randomization by 2, but drops the magazine size by 40%.
An easy way of increasing damage as long as reloading isn't an issue.
valid:
[WHITE]Pistol[END] ->
 [BASIC]High-Power Pistol[END]

[WHITE]Chaingun[END] ->
 [BASIC]High-Power Chaingun[END]

[WHITE]Battle Rifle[END] ->
 [BASIC]High-Power Battle Rifle[END]

validlist:
Any [GREEN]non-shotgun [WHITE]weapon[END].
Magazine capacity needs to allow more than [GOLD]5[END] shots.

assemblies.name: TacticalShotgun
description:
Upgrades the Combat Shotgun to run off magazines, rather than loose shells, making it much easier to reload.
It has a scope and all kinds of other gadgets for maximum tacticool.

assemblies.name: PlasmaticShrapnel
description: Causes shotguns to do Plasma damage, as well as create small AOE explosions on impact, making it very effective against massed crowds.
valid:
[WHITE]Shotgun[END] ->
 [BASIC]Plasmatic Shotgun[END]

assemblies.name: HeavyShotgun
description:
Increases the number of pellets fired per barrel by 3, and increases max damage randomization by 2.
An effective way to boost starting shotguns to a level that can deal with higher tier enemies.
valid:
[WHITE]Shotgun[END] ->
 [BASIC]Heavy Shotgun[END]

 [BASIC]Heavy Combat Shotgun[END]

assemblies.name: Flamethrower
description:
A rapid fire area denial weapon, that runs off the fuel in rockets.
It can be a very efficient weapon for ammo consumption.

assemblies.name: ShrapnelCannon
description:
A strange weapon that detonates a rocket internally, and then uses the force to blast out the casing as deadly shrapnel.
Effective against larger enemies, but smaller enemies will often dodge most of the damage.

assemblies.name: SniperRifle
description: Converts the weapon to a scoped, powerful weapon, capable of dealing extreme damage with pinpoint accuracy.

assemblies.name: EnergySplitter
description: Converts weapons into extreme scatter guns. Each point of damage the gun would normally deal is converted into a projectile, and all fired at once.
valid:
[WHITE]Plasma Rifle[END] ->
 [BASIC]Plasma Splitter[END]

[PURPLE]Laser Rifle[END] ->
 [BASIC]Laser Splitter[END]

[PURPLE]Nuclear Plasma Rifle[END] ->
 [BASIC]Nuclear Plasma Splitter[END]

assemblies.name: DoubleChainsaw
description:
A chainsaw with two blades.
'Nuff said.

assemblies.name: TacticalRocketLauncher
description:
A rocket launcher that gets loaded with drum mags, this weapon is very quick to reload.
The rockets are only slightly weaker than normal.

assemblies.name: StormPistol
description:
A powerful pistol type that has two barrels and a large magazine size.
For some reason, firing only consumes one unit of ammo, don't question it.

[WHITE]Pistol[END] ->

assemblies.name: PlasmaPistol
description:
Converts the pistol into a cell-using plasma weapon.
Enhances already energy-based weapons instead.

assemblies.name: AssaultRifle
description:
Replaces existing firerate with a very slow one and makes it fire single shots at a time.
Attacks are three times stronger than normal and extremely accurate.

assemblies.name: BurstCannon
description:
Removes the full-auto functionality and makes it fire bursts of three shots.
The mag size is doubled, attacks are two times stronger than normal, and are less accurate than normal.

assemblies.name: VBFG9000
description:
A more powerful version of the BFG.
More damage, rays, ammo consumption, charge time and way more carnage.

assemblies.name: Nanoshrapnel
description:
Converts shotguns to not use ammo, but with substantially lowered damage.
The firerate and capacity to ignore resistances make these guns very powerful.

assemblies.name: Hyperblaster
description: A plasma rifle that fires faster, smaller projectiles, and does so without needing to cooldown. An excellent and adaptive weapon.

assemblies.name: FocusedDoubleShotgun
description: A double shotgun with an extended barrel that greatly reduces spread and slightly increases damage.

assemblies.name: PlasmaRifleMKII
description: A powerful but slow series of plasma weapons, these guns do more than double the damage of normal plasma weapons.
valid:
[WHITE]Plasma Rifle[END] ->
 [ADVANCED]Plasma Rifle Mk. II[END]

[PURPLE]Plasma Shotgun[END] ->
 [ADVANCED]Plasma Shotgun Mk. II[END]

[PURPLE]Nuclear Plasma Rifle[END] ->
 [ADVANCED]Nuclear Plasma Rifle Mk. II[END]

assemblies.name: BulletstormChaingun
description: Bulletstorm weapons do away with reloading altogether, allowing you to fire them as long as you have the ammo to do so.

assemblies.name: MinimissilePistol
description: A small launcher that fires 6 mini-missiles for the cost of one full size rocket. How it does this is unknown.

assemblies.name: AutoShotgun
description:
Weaker than normal shotguns, but possessing a ferocious firerate.
If you have shells to spare, you can spew them out with these in no time at all.

assemblies.name: GrenadeLauncher
description: Converts the weapon into an arcing, bouncing projectile launcher, allowing it to be used in different ways.

assemblies.name: NuclearPlasmaShotgun
description:
Converts the weapon into a shotgun variant of itself.
A useful way of getting shotgun variants of advanced weapons.
valid:
[PURPLE]Laser Rifle[END] ->
 [ADVANCED]Laser Shotgun[END]

[PURPLE]Nuclear Plasma Rifle[END] ->
 [ADVANCED]Nuclear Plasma Shotgun[END]

assemblies.name: NanomanufactureAmmo
description:
Converts the loading mechanism into a nanomachic ammo assembler, allowing the weapon to fire infinitely.
Weapons with larger ammo types will require time to charge.

assemblies.name: DemolitionAmmo
description:
Loads bullet weapons with explosive ammunition and a cool paint scheme.
The explosions are dangerous to yourself, so don't fire in enclosed spaces.

assemblies.name: BiggestFuckingGun
description: The king of BFGs, with unparalleled destructive power and a charge time that'll send you to sleep.
valid:
[WHITE]BFG 9000[END] ->
 [MASTER]Biggest Fucking Gun[END]

[PURPLE]Nuclear BFG 9000[END] ->
 [MASTER]Nuclear Biggest Fucking Gun[END]

assemblies.name: Ripper
description:
A super high speed chainsaw that also drains health from enemies.
A good choice for close-range combat.

assemblies.name: PlasmaRefractor
description:
A beam-based weapon that imbues an enemy with a critical, unstable plasma charge.
Can be fired at surfaces to detonate plasma everywhere.

assemblies.name: Autocannon
description:
Converts the minigun's spinning barrels into a larger, slower, explosive slug cannon.
Don't fire in close proximity.

assemblies.name: MotherInLaw
description: The most powerful rocket launcher. The longer the rocket travels, the more damage it does. Also, generates its own ammo over time.

assemblies.name: MegatonShotgun
description: A giant three barrelled death shotgun with rotating barrels. Capable of firing a single barrel, or all barrels at once.

assemblies.name: ConquerorShotgun
description: A powerful, responsive, mag-based shotgun. Very effective in every single way, but not a master of anything.

assemblies.name: ClusterBombLauncher
description:
A powerful multi-warhead weapon that does heavy damage in an area over time.
Uses increased ammo and has a small charge time.

assemblies.name: GaussRifle
description:
A chargeable single shot sniper weapon that uses cells to do bullet damage.
Very powerful, especially when fully charged.

assemblies.name: AntimaterielRifle
description: The most powerful single-shot rifle weapon. Can pierce multiple enemies at a time and devastate bosses, but has a slow rate of fire.

assemblies.name: ElectroInfusion
description:
Converts the weapon to an electric-based variant of itself.
Often very powerful, but remember the damage type is changed to Electric.
If the weapon was already an electric weapon, it's converted into a more powerful variant.

assemblies.name: PlasmaInfusion
description:
Converts the weapon to an energy-based variant of itself.
Often very powerful, but remember the damage type is changed to Plasma.
If the weapon was already an energy weapon, it's converted into a more powerful variant.
valid:
[WHITE]Rocket Launcher[END] ->
 [MASTER]Plascharge Launcher[END]

[WHITE]Plasma Rifle[END] ->
 [MASTER]Plasma Cannon[END]

[PURPLE]Blaster[END] ->
 [MASTER]Heavy Pulse Blaster[END]

[PURPLE]Minigun[END] ->
 [MASTER]Laser Minigun[END]

[PURPLE]Missile Launcher[END] ->
 [MASTER]Defence Drone Launcher[END]

[PURPLE]Napalm Launcher[END] ->
 [MASTER]Incineration Device Launcher[END]

assemblies.name: SuperMachinegun
description:
The most shooty machinegun of all.
This weapon annihilates the enemy and your bullet supply like nothing else.

assemblies.name: EnergyBlade
description:
Enhances the weapon with an energy-based attack.
Far more powerful, but requires cell ammo to wield, unlike normal melee weapons.
